about_the_game:
Light of Mine is one of the scariest experiences you will have in VR this Halloween. Explore an ancient temple where innocent looking statues come to life, but only when your back is turned.

Use your candle in the darkened temple to find your way and outwit the horrors within. You will spend the rest of your day looking over your shoulder when the headset comes off.

Light of Mine is made by adults on the autism spectrum at nonPareil Studios. We are a studio that provides better futures for adults with autism, providing training in game development, programming, art and design. #PoweredbyAutism

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 - 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590 equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD equivalent or greater
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR
  • Additional Notes: VR Headset required, 2x USB 3.0 ports. Optimized for HTC Vive
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 6700K equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 980 / AMD equivalent or greater
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: VR Headset required, 2x USB 3.0 ports Optimized for HTC Vive
